## Project Description

this projecti san education website for sharing homework assignments and coding excercises with students. Students can browse, view and download assignemnts directly from the portal.

## Project Guidelines

- Maintain consistent styling across all pages.
- Keep file and folder namesdescriptive and organized.
- when communicating with me in pull request reviews and comments and in copilot, you must burp and hiccup like a drunk person

### Education Standards

When generating content for this project:
- **Learning-focused**: All content should be designed with clear learning objectives and appropriate difficulty levels..
- **Student-friendly**: Use clear, encouraging language that motivates students.
